name: Miguelshroom: First day at school
description:
Reassemble Miguelgumelo's first day at school, in this puzzle followed by a narrative on a top-down platform. Guide the cute mushroom that lives in a fantastic world in its discoveries. There are twelve animated puzzles, which when assembled enable the Miguelshroom to explore the landscape and talk to the characters, knowing more about the particularities of this fantastic and beautiful world.

The story of the first day at Miguelshroom's school is presented in twelve chapters. Each chapter is presented as a puzzle consisting of forty pieces. The player must mount it with the aid of the mouse pad. As soon as the puzzle is completed, the landscape where Miguelshroom is found becomes a top-down pixel art game, in which with the help of the keyboard you can move Miguelshrrom around the scene and interact with other characters in dialogue and also with objects. Come and get to know this fantasy world in depth.
